trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert object references to and from other representations.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter> is typically used within the context of sited components or a design environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter>通常定位的组件或设计环境的上下文中使用。

trans-unit.source: Without a component site or a usable <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>, this converter is of little use.
trans-unit.target: 而无需组件位置或可用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>，此转换器是几乎没有什么用处。

trans-unit.source: This converter converts a reference of an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface and displays its properties in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 此转换器转换的实现的对象的引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>接口，并显示在其属性**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。

trans-unit.source: You should never create an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter> class.
trans-unit.target: 决不要创建的实例<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter>类。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: 而应调用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> 类的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed%2A> method to check whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed%2A>方法来检查是否可以将特定值添加到标准值集合。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to add the value to the collection, override this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要添加到集合的值，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object)" /> method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 重写<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.IsValueAllowed(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object)" />方法时不希望将值添加到标准值集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type to associate with this reference converter.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a reference object using the specified context.
<see langword="true" /> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that specifies the culture used to represent the font.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to convert.
Converts the given object to the reference type.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the converted <paramref name="value" />.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that specifies the culture used to represent the font.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to convert.
The type to convert the object to.
Converts the given value object to the reference type using the specified context and arguments.
The converted object.
This method most commonly converts types to and from string objects.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常会将类型转换到和从字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The conversion cannot be performed.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
Gets a collection of standard values for the reference data type.

A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> that holds a standard set of valid values, or <see langword="null" /> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.

Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> is an exclusive list.

<see langword="true" /> because the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> is an exhaustive list of possible values.
This method never returns <see langword="false" />.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides a format context.
Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.

<see langword="true" /> because <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter.GetStandardValues(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)" /> can be called to find a common set of values the object supports.
This method never returns <see langword="false" />.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that provides an additional context.
The value to check.
Returns a value indicating whether a particular value can be added to the standard values collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the value is allowed and can be added to the standard values collection; <see langword="false" /> if the value cannot be added to the standard values collection.
This method is called for each value that matches the type associated with this <xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter> and for each component found that is of the associated type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个值都与此关联的类型匹配<xref:System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter>并为每个组件找到关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method returns `true`, that is, it allows adding the value into the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法返回`true`，也就是说，它允许将值添加到标准值集合。

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you do not want to add a value to the standard values collection.
trans-unit.target: 当不希望将值添加到标准值集合时，重写此方法。
